backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor handling access-controlled user profiles and admin-only lead management with add, view, list, and delete operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented branding and asset-update features with linked files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of core frontend pages and components for documentation and build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base file defining theme tokens, light/dark variables, and global styling utilities.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file setting meta tags, favicon path, and loading the React app entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router with all main routes and wraps the app with RouterProvider.
frontend/src/components/conversion/Stick: Mobile-only sticky CTA bar offering Book Trial and WhatsApp actions using marketing config data.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer displaying branding, quick links, contact details, social icons, and attribution based on marketing and branding configs.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Responsive header with logo, navigation links, and mobile menu logic using branding config.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Top-level layout composing Header, Footer, mobile CTA, and an Outlet for routed content.
frontend/src/components/sections/LeadFor: Interactive lead capture form that collects user details, builds a combined message, and submits via useSubmitLead with success UI handling.
frontend/src/components/sections/Limited: Empty file placeholder for a limited-time offer banner component.
frontend/src/components/sections/MapEmbe: Embeds a Google Maps iframe inside a styled card using configuration values for location.
frontend/src/components/sections/PlanCom: Displays gym plan features across membership tiers with desktop table and mobile stacked views.
frontend/src/components/sections/Trainer: Renders a grid of coach highlight cards using COACHES config data with names, specialties, and experience.
frontend/src/components/seo/Seo.tsx: Sets page title and meta description and injects structured data JSON-LD for gym SEO.
frontend/src/components/social/Testimoni: Carousel showcasing client testimonials with ratings, roles, and short reviews.
frontend/src/config/branding.ts: Defines branding constants including logo path, alt text, and company name.
frontend/src/config/coaches.ts: Exports coach interface and list of coach profiles with specialties and optional experience.
frontend/src/config/marketing.ts: Holds marketing, contact, location, map, and working hours configuration for the gym.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state, login, logout, and status flags. Wraps AuthClient creation with default options and restores identity on load.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a hook that fetches all leads using a backend actor via React Query. Only runs when the actor is ready.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitLead.ts: Defines a mutation hook for submitting new leads through the actor. Invalidates the leads query on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind styles configuring color variables, dark mode, typography, and utility classes including gold/green-accent mappings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider and loading global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the gym’s About page with mission, vision, and value sections using styled cards and SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/CafePage.tsx: Displays the Fitness Café page with nutrition concept details and menu categories using cards and SEO metadata.
Shows a contact and free trial booking page with a lead form, contact details, map embed, and SEO info.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page displaying hero banner, service cards, testimonials, and trainer highlights with SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/MembershipPlansPage.t: Shows membership pricing tiers with plan details, comparison table, and SEO settings.
frontend/src/pages/ProgramsPage.tsx: Displays detailed descriptions of fitness programs including strength, weight loss, and Zumba, with CTAs and SEO info.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module for reading, storing, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, including hash-based parsing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme colors, typography, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project metadata and state describing logo replacement features, requirements, and pending updates.
